pr_title: Add sample versions of standard deviation and variance functions

timeline.message:
Add STDDEV_SAMP, VAR_SAMP

This commit adds the sampling variations of the standard deviation and
variance agg functions.

test suites fixes

Correct CSV tests.

timeline.author: matriv
